creator: Kings Gambit, LLC
descriptionHtml:
FREE Magic: The Gathering tracking app. Track MTG life totals, poison counters, commander damage, energy, and anything else you want with an easy to use, customizable interface.

• 100% free with no ads
• Supports up to 8 players with multiple layout options
• Add any number of built-in or custom counters
• Use images, text, emoji, and animated gifs to customize counters
• Create custom profiles for players or decks
descriptionShort: Customizable MTG Life and Counter Tracker

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Major redesign of the app!
• Streamlined game creation via Setup screen
• More layout options
• More ways to customize counters including images, text, emoji, and animated GIFs

Spell Counter is now open source!

• Supports up to 8 players with multiple layout options
• Add any number of built-in or custom counters
• Use images, text, emoji, and animated gifs to customize counters
• Create custom profiles for players or decks
